coverPage.additionalInformation: BlackRock Advisors, LLC is an institutional investment manager subject to Section 13(f) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and the rules promulgated thereunder. BlackRock Advisors, LLC is a subsidiary of BlackRock, Inc. BlackRock Capital Management, Inc.is a subsidiary of BlackRock Advisors, LLC. The securities positions reported by BlackRock Advisors, LLC on behalf of BlackRock Capital Management, Inc. is also being reported on behalf of BlackRock Advisors, LLC, however BlackRock Advisors, LLC does not exercise, and therefore disclaims, investment discretion with respect to any Section 13(f) securities positions over which BlackRock Capital Management, Inc. exercises such discretion. BlackRock Capital Management, Inc., and BlackRock Advisors, LLC are subsidiaries of BlackRock, Inc. The securities positions reported by BlackRock Advisors, LLC, including the positions reported on behalf of BlackRock Capital Management Inc., are also being reported on behalf of BlackRock, Inc.. However, BlackRock, Inc. does not exercise, and therefore disclaims, investment discretion with respect to any Section 13(f) securities positions over which BlackRock Capital Management, Inc., or BlackRock Advisors, LLC exercises such discretion.

signatureBlock.name: Matthew J. Fitzgerald
signatureBlock.title: Attorney-In-Fact pursuant to PoA date July 10, 2012
